member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData
member.summary: Data for a status compare job.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of CompareJobData.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this CompareJobData object.
member.returns: A CompareJobData object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.Abort
member.summary: Indicates whether the job operation has been aborted.
member.value: **true** if the job has been aborted; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.CompareResults
member.summary: The CompareJob's results as a DocumentDifference difference set.
member.value: A DocumentDifference object. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.Documents
member.summary: An `IList<`LEADDocument`>` to compare.
member.value: An IList<LEADDocument>.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.Errors
member.summary: An `IList` of errors that occurred during the compare process.
member.value: An `IList<string>` containing error data. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.IsCompleted
member.summary: Indicates whether the compare operation has completed.
member.value: **true** if the operation completed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.JobCompletedTimestamp
member.summary: UTC timestamp indicating when the compare job completed.
member.value: String corresponding to a UTC timestamp. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.JobStartedTimestamp
member.summary: UTC timestamp for when the compare job started.
member.value: String corresponding to a UTC timestamp. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.JobStatus
member.summary: Indicates the current CompareStatus for the compare job.
member.value: A valid CompareStatus value.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.JobStatusChangedTimestamp
member.summary: UTC timestamp for when the compare job's JobStatus was last updated.
member.value: String corresponding to a UTC timestamp. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.JobToken
member.summary: Job token associated with this job.
member.value: Job token associated with this job. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.OutputCache
member.summary: The cache that will contain the output document.
member.value: The cache that will contain the output document. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.OutputDocumentId
member.summary: The ID of the report generated by this compare job.
member.value: The ID of the report document generated by this compare job. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.OutputDocumentName
member.summary: The name of the report generated by this compare operation.
member.value: The name of the report generated by this compare operation. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.OutputMimetype
member.summary: The mimetype of the report to be generated by this compare operation.
member.value: The mimetype of the report to be generated by this compare operation. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.OutputPolicy
member.summary: Policy to use when storing the output document in the cache.
member.value: Policy to use when storing the output document in the cache. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.OutputUri
member.summary: URL to the output report in the cache.
member.value: URL to the output report in the cache. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.ReportOptions
member.summary: The ReportOptions to be used with this compare job.
member.value: The ReportOptions to be used with this compare job. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.StatusCache
member.summary: Cache to use for storing the status of the job.
member.value: The cache to use for storing the status of the job. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.StatusPolicy
member.summary: Policy to use when storing the status items in the cache.
member.value: Policy to use when storing status items in the cache. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData.UserToken
member.summary: User token associated with this job.
member.value: User token associated with this job. The default value is **null**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunner
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunner.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunner.AbortJob(Leadtools.Caching.ObjectCache,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Aborts the specified compare job.
member.param: Cache containing the status data.
Value indicating the user token of the job.
Value indicating the token of the job.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunner.DeleteJob(Leadtools.Caching.ObjectCache,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the specified job.
member.param: Cache containing the status data.
Value indicating the user token of the job.
Value indicating the job token of the job.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunner.PrepareJob(Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData)
member.summary: Prepares to run a job.
member.param: Information and options for the job to be run. This value must not be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunner.QueryJobStatus(Leadtools.Caching.ObjectCache,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the status of the specified job.
member.param: Cache containing the status data.
Value indicating the user token of the job.
Value indicating the job token of the job.
member.returns: Data containing the last status of this job if found; otherwise, **null** if no such job was found.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunner.RunJob(Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData)
member.summary: Runs the compare job.
member.param: Information and options for the job to be run. This value must not be **null**.

member.name: E:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunner.Operation
member.summary: Operation event that occurs while a job is running.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunnerEventArgs
member.summary: Data for the CompareJobRunner.Operation event.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunnerEventArgs.#ctor(Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunnerOperation,System.Boolean,Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobData,System.Object)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of CompareJobRunnerEventArgs.
member.param: The operation occurring.
Indicates whether the engine has already run the operation. **true** if the operation has already been run; otherwise, **false**.
The data for the job.
Optional data related to the operation.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunnerEventArgs.CompareJobData
member.summary: Gets the current CompareJobData.
member.value: The current CompareJobData that was passed to CompareJobRunner.RunJob.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunnerEventArgs.Data
member.summary: Object containing the data for the events.
member.value: The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunnerEventArgs.IsPostOperation
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the engine has already run the operation.
member.value: **true** if the engine has already run the operation; otherwise, **false** and the engine is about to run the operation.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunnerEventArgs.Operation
member.summary: Gets the current operation.
member.value: A CompareJobRunnerOperation enumeration member that specifies the current operation.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Compare.Difference
member.summary: Abstract object describing the difference between two compare objects.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.Difference.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of Difference.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.Difference.GetLocations
member.summary: Gets the locations of all differences in a compare set.
member.returns: An enumeration value of DifferenceLocations.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DifferenceLocation
member.summary: Holds the positional information for a Difference object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DifferenceLocation.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of DifferenceLocation.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DifferenceLocation.Bounds
member.summary: The bounding rectangle for the Difference object.
member.value: A LeadRectD containing the bounds. Default value is an empty rectangle.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DifferenceLocation.PageNumber
member.summary: The page where the Difference is located.
member.value: 1-based page number where the Difference is located.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentCompareOptions
member.summary: The options to be used with the DocumentComparer.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentCompareOptions.CheckLines
member.summary: Enables additional pre-checking when comparing text.
member.value: **true** to enable pre-checking; **false** to disable pre-checking. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentCompareOptions.Comparer
member.summary: The DocumentComparer associated with the DocumentCompareOptions.
member.value: A DocumentComparer object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentCompareOptions.EditCost
member.summary: Cost of an empty edit operation in terms of edit characters.
member.value: An integer reflecting the empty edit cost. The default value is 4.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentCompareOptions.MatchDistance
member.summary: How far to search for a match.
member.value: An integer corresponding to the distance the pattern can be from the expected location. Default value is 1000.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentCompareOptions.MatchThreshold
member.summary: The threshold used to determine the point at which "no match" is declared.
member.value: A `float` between 0 and 1 indicating the threshold. The default value is 0.5.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentCompareOptions.PatchDeleteThreshold
member.summary: Indicates how closely the sample contents have to be to match the expected contents when deleting a block of text that is over 64 characters.
member.value: A `float` between 0 and 1 indicating the threshold. The default value is 0.5.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentCompareOptions.PerformSemanticCleanup
member.summary: Indicates whether the document compare results should be cleaned up to make them more human-readable.
member.value: **true** to perform semantic cleanup; otherwise, **false**. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentCompareOptions.Timeout
member.summary: The maximum number of seconds for a compare operation.
member.value: A `float` corresponding to the number of seconds before a timeout occurs. Default is 1 second.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentComparer
member.summary: Supports comparing strings, DocumentPageText, and LEADDocument objects.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of DocumentComparer.

member.summary: Compares a list of LEADDocument objects.
member.param: The LEADDocuments to compare.
member.returns: A DocumentDifference object.

member.summary: Compares a list of DocumentPageText objects and maps the results to a DocumentDifference
member.param: List of DocumentPageText objects to compare.
The page number that the DocumentPageText object corresponds to.
member.returns: A DocumentDifference object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentComparer.CompareRasterPage(Leadtools.Document.DocumentPage,Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions)
member.summary: Performs a raster-based comparison on a list of DocumentPage objects.
member.param: List of DocumentPage objects to compare.
The RasterCompareOptions to use.
member.returns: A new LEADDocument containing the output image.

member.summary: Compares a list of DocumentPageText objects
member.param: List of DocumentPageText objects to compare.
member.returns: A list of TextDifferences.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentComparer.CompareText(IList<string>)
member.summary: Compares two strings
member.param: List of strings to compare.
member.returns: A list of TextDifferences.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentComparer.Options
member.summary: The DocumentCompareOptions that the DocumentComparer will use.
member.value: DocumentCompareOptions object.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference
member.summary: Holds the result set for positional text-based comparisons.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of DocumentDifference.

member.summary: Indicates whether the next PageCharactersDifference object tagged with DifferenceOperation.Delete can be retrieved from the result set.
member.returns: Target Platforms

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.CanGetNextInsertion
member.summary: Indicates whether the next PageCharactersDifference object tagged with DifferenceOperation.Insert can be retrieved from the result set.
member.returns: Target Platforms

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.CanGetPreviousDeletion
member.summary: Indicates whether the previous PageCharactersDifference object tagged with DifferenceOperation.Delete can be retrieved from the result set.
member.returns: Target Platforms

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.CanGetPreviousInsertion
member.summary: Indicates whether the previous PageCharactersDifference object tagged with DifferenceOperation.Insert can be retrieved from the result set.
member.returns: Target Platforms

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.GenerateMarkdownReport(System.IO.Stream,Leadtools.Document.Compare.MarkdownReportOptions)
member.summary: Generates a Markdown Report from the result set.
member.param: The stream to save the report to.
The MarkdownReportOptions to use when building the report.
member.returns: The report will be saved to the provided stream.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.GetDeletions
member.summary: Retrieves all PageCharactersDifference objects tagged with DifferenceOperation.Delete.
member.returns: An IList<PageCharactersDifference> containing all DifferenceOperation.Delete operations in the result set.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.GetInsertions
member.summary: Retrieves all PageCharactersDifference objects tagged with DifferenceOperation.Insert.
member.returns: An IList<PageCharactersDifference> containing all DifferenceOperation.Insert operations in the result set.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.GetNextDeletion
member.summary: Retrieves the next PageCharactersDifference object tagged with DifferenceOperation.Delete from the result set.
member.returns: A PageCharactersDifference object. If there are no other PageCharactersDifference objects tagged as DifferenceOperation.Delete, then **null** is returned.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.GetNextInsertion
member.summary: Retrieves the next PageCharactersDifference object tagged with DifferenceOperation.Insert from the result set.
member.returns: A PageCharactersDifference object. If there are no other PageCharactersDifference objects tagged as DifferenceOperation.Insert, then **null** is returned.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.GetPreviousDeletion
member.summary: Retrieves the previous PageCharactersDifference object tagged with DifferenceOperation.Delete from the result set.
member.returns: A PageCharactersDifference object. If there are no other PageCharactersDifference objects tagged as DifferenceOperation.Delete, then **null** is returned.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.GetPreviousInsertion
member.summary: Retrieves the previous PageCharactersDifference object tagged with DifferenceOperation.Insert from the result set.
member.returns: A PageCharactersDifference object. If there are no other PageCharactersDifference objects tagged as DifferenceOperation.Insert, then **null** is returned.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.HasDeletions
member.summary: Indicates whether the result set has PageCharactersDifference objects tagged as DifferenceOperation.Delete.
member.returns: Target Platforms

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.HasInsertions
member.summary: Indicates whether the result set has PageCharactersDifference objects tagged as DifferenceOperation.Insert.
member.returns: Target Platforms

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.ResetDeletionCounter
member.summary: Resets the internal DifferenceOperation.Delete for the DocumentDifference object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.ResetInsertionCounter
member.summary: Resets the internal DifferenceOperation.Insert for the DocumentDifference object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.DocumentDifference.Differences
member.summary: List of all PageCharactersDifference for the result set.
member.value: An IList<PageCharactersDifference>.

member.summary: Options to be used in conjunction with DocumentDifference.GenerateMarkdownReport.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of MarkdownReportOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.MarkdownReportOptions.BaseCSSClass
member.summary: The CSS class to be associated with text tagged as DifferenceOperation.Equal.
member.value: A string corresponding to the CSS class name. The default value is `markdownBase`.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.MarkdownReportOptions.DeletionCSSClass
member.summary: The CSS class to be associated with text tagged as DifferenceOperation.Delete.
member.value: A string corresponding to the CSS class name. The default value is `markdownDelete`.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.MarkdownReportOptions.InsertionCSSClass
member.summary: The CSS class to be associated with text tagged as DifferenceOperation.Insert.
member.value: A string corresponding to the CSS class name. The default value is `markdownInsert`.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.MarkdownReportOptions.StrikethroughCSSClass
member.summary: The CSS class to be associated with text that has the `Strikethrough` text decorator.
member.value: A string corresponding to the CSS class name. The default value is `markdownStrikethrough`.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.MarkdownReportOptions.UnderlineCSSClass
member.summary: The CSS class to be associated with text that has the `Underline` text decorator.
member.value: A string corresponding to the CSS class name. The default value is `markdownUnderline`.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Compare.PageCharacter
member.summary: Holds additional information about DocumentCharacter, such as the page number, wordmap index, and character index.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.PageCharacter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of PageCharacter.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.PageCharacter.Character
member.summary: The DocumentCharacter object retrieved from the DocumentPageText.Characters property.
member.value: DocumentCharacter object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.PageCharacter.CharacterIndex
member.summary: The index where the Character can be found in the original DocumentPageText.Characters list.
member.value: An integer corresponding to the index value.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.PageCharacter.PageNumber
member.summary: The page number where the Character is found.
member.value: An integer corresponding to the page number.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.PageCharacter.WordMapIndex
member.summary: The index where the CharacterIndex can be found in the original DocumentPageText.TextMap.
member.value: An integer corresponding to the DocumentPageText.TextMap index.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Compare.PageCharactersDifference
member.summary: Holds PageCharacter difference information.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.PageCharactersDifference.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of PageCharactersDifference.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.PageCharactersDifference.GetForPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves all PageCharacters corresponding to the provided page number.
member.param: Page number to look for.
member.returns: List of PageCharacters found on the page. If no characters are found, **null** is returned.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.PageCharactersDifference.GetLocations
member.summary: Maps the result set to an enumerable of DifferenceLocations.
member.returns: An enumerable of DifferenceLocations. If no PageCharacters exist, an empty list will be returned.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.PageCharactersDifference.Characters
member.summary: List of PageCharacters in the difference set.
member.value: List of PageCharacters. Default value is an empty list.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions
member.summary: Options to use when comparing DocumentPage objects as raster content.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of RasterCompareOptions().

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.ModifiedBackground
member.summary: Background color for the modified document.
member.value: A valid RasterColor, used to identify the background content within the modified document. The default value is RasterColor.White.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.ModifiedForeground
member.summary: Foreground color for the modified document.
member.value: A valid RasterColor, used to identify the foreground content within the modified image. Typically, the foreground color is used to identify text. The default value is RasterColor.Black.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.ModifiedOffset
member.summary: Indicates the offset for the modified document page.
member.value: A LeadPointD defining the shift for the modified document page. The default value is a point of (0,0).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.ModifiedRotationAngle
member.summary: Indicates the rotation angle for the modified document page.
member.value: A number corresponding to the rotation angle. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.OriginalBackground
member.summary: Background color for the original document.
member.value: A valid RasterColor used to identify the background content within the original document. The default value is RasterColor.White.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.OriginalForeground
member.summary: Foreground color for the original document.
member.value: A valid RasterColor, used to identify the foreground content within the original document. Typically, the foreground color is used to identify text. The default value is RasterColor.Black.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.OriginalOffset
member.summary: Indicates the offset for the original document page.
member.value: A LeadPointD defining the shift for the document page. The default value is a point of (0,0).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.OriginalRotationAngle
member.summary: Indicates the rotation angle for the original document page.
member.value: A number corresponding to a rotation angle. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.OutputAddition
member.summary: Color specifying the output pixel color of added information.
member.value: A valid RasterColor used in the output document to indicate pixels which were background content in the original document, but not in the modified document. Additionally, any pixels within the bounds of the modified document that were not within the bounds of the original document will be marked with this color. The default value is new RasterColor(0,255,0).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.OutputBackground
member.summary: Background color in the output document.
member.value: A valid RasterColor. The default value is RasterColor.White.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.OutputCache
member.summary: Cache used for saving the output LEADDocument.
member.value: A valid ObjectCache instance. The default is null.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.OutputChange
member.summary: A RasterColor object specifying the output pixel color of changed information.
member.value: The color used in the output document to indicate pixels which are different in both documents (but were neither additions nor deletions). A valid RasterColor. The default value is new RasterColor(255,255,0).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.OutputDeletion
member.summary: Color corresponding to a deletion region in the output document.
member.value: A valid RasterColor. The default value is new RasterColor(255,0,0).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.OutputDocumentID
member.summary: The LEADDocument.DocumentId for the output document.
member.value: A valid string. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.OutputDocumentName
member.summary: Name of the output document
member.value: A string value. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.OutputExternal
member.summary: A color corresponding to an external region in the output document.
member.value: A valid RasterColor color used in the output document to indicate pixels which were not part of either document. The default value is new RasterColor(128,128,255).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.OutputMatch
member.summary: A color corresponding to a match region in the output document.
member.value: The color used in the output document to indicate pixels which were equal in both documents. A valid RasterColor. The default value is new RasterColor(64,64,64).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.RasterCompareOptions.Threshold
member.summary: A number indicating the color threshold.
member.value: A valid number. The default value is 30.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Compare.ReportOptions
member.summary: The base options that are used when generating a report.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.ReportOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of ReportOptions.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.ReportOptions.BaseColor
member.summary: Color to be associated with text tagged as DifferenceOperation.Equal.
member.value: A string containing a valid color value. Default value is `#000000`.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.ReportOptions.DeletionColor
member.summary: Color to be associated with text tagged as DifferenceOperation.Delete.
member.value: A string containing a valid color value. Default value is `#ff0000`.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.ReportOptions.DocumentNames
member.summary: Gets a list of names corresponding to the LEADDocument objects that were compared.
member.value: List of strings. Default value is an empty list.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.ReportOptions.InsertionColor
member.summary: Color to be associated with text tagged as DifferenceOperation.Insert.
member.value: A string containing a valid color value. Default value is `#66CD00`.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.ReportOptions.ReportFooters
member.summary: Gets a list of strings to be used as footer text in the report.
member.value: A list of strings. The default value is an empty list.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.ReportOptions.ReportHeaders
member.summary: Gets a list of strings to be used as header text in the report.
member.value: A list of strings. The default value is an empty list.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.ReportOptions.StrikethroughColor
member.summary: Color to be associated with text that has the `Strikethrough` text decorator.
member.value: A string containing a valid color value. Default value is `#b20000`.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.ReportOptions.UnderlineColor
member.summary: Color to be associated with text that has the `Underline` text decorator.
member.value: A string containing a valid color value. Default value is `#458B00`.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Compare.TextDifference
member.summary: Object for holding text-comparison information.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.TextDifference.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of TextDifference.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Document.Compare.TextDifference.GetLocations
member.summary: Maps the result set to an enumerable of DifferenceLocation.
member.returns: Returns **null**. The TextDifference object does not contain any positional data.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.TextDifference.Operation
member.summary: The DifferenceOperation associated with the difference.
member.value: DifferenceOperation value.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Compare.TextDifference.Text
member.summary: The text for the difference.
member.value: A string containing all the text for the difference.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunnerOperation
member.summary: Types of Compare runner operations.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunnerOperation.BeginUpload
member.summary: The compare runner is invoking DocumentFactory.BeginUpload on the output report.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Compare.CompareJobRunnerOperation.Upload
